alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Clay (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 12:34PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Hot and Humid weather this afternoon through early this evening... The combination of temperatures in the lower to mid 90s and high humidity will result in heat index values reaching 100 to around 105 across much of southeast Tennessee, central east Tennessee, parts of the Cumberland Plateau and southwest North Carolina during the afternoon and early evening hours today. Take extra precautions if you work or spend time outside. Know the signs and symptoms of heat exhaustion and heat stroke. Drink plenty of fluids, stay in air-conditioned rooms, stay out of the direct sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors that may not have direct access to air conditioning. Make sure that your pets have shade and plenty of water, or bring them inside if possible. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.
